nodes.text: This clone trooper participated in the Battle of Kamino around 21 BBY.

During the battle of assault on Tipoca City, this clone trooper and and the rest of his squad held back the Separatist Droid army with their DC-15S blaster carbines. To the end of the battle, Jedi General Anakin Skywalker dueled Dark Acolyte Asajj Ventress and succeeded in recovering the clone DNA sample she had stole. Seeing this, Ventress became enraged and attacked Skywalker, knocking the DNA sample out of his hand and onto the ground. She then used the Force to lift up the sample but before she could drag it back into her hands, this clone trooper caught it in mid air. The rest of the clone squad then arrived and managed to overpower Ventress, forcing her to retreat.
